summary: This mod gives a lot more variety with Skyrim circlets and their enchantments making them the ultimate attire for mages.  I have set them to level higher to cater for elite players, and I have introduced new enchanted circlets with new powers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://img708.imageshack.us/img708/8823/titlecirclet.png[/img][/center]

[color=#ee82ee][font=georgia,serif][size=6]Description[/size][/font][/color]

This mod gives a lot more variety with Skyrim circlets and their enchantments making them the ultimate attire for mages.  I have set them to level higher to cater for elite players, and I have introduced new enchanted circlets with new powers. 
 
- Adds lots of stronger circlet variants that will spawn at higher levels, up to player level of 80.  Normally there are around 6 stages they will improve, now there are around 12.
- Everything is fully integrated into the game and will appear in loot, sold by vendors, used by NPCs, by chance depending on your level
- Several new enchanted and levelled circlets...
 
[color=#40e0d0][font=georgia,serif][size=5]New Circlets:[/size][/font][/color]
[LIST]
[*]Fortify Enchantment[/*]
[*]Magicka Regeneration[/*]
[*]Fortify Health[/*]
[*]Health Regeneration[/*]
[*]Fortify Speechcraft[/*]
[*]Fortify Stamina[/*]
[*]Stamina Regeneration[/*]
[*]Resist Fire[/*]
[*]Resist Frost[/*]
[*]Resist Shock[/*]
[*]Resist Magic[/*]
[*]Reflect Damage - New enchantment, works the same as the effect in TES IV.  When attacked by physical weapons a calculated percentage is reflected on to the attacker, maximum of 50% at highest player levels.[/*]
[*]Movement Speed - New enchantment, grants the player a subtle boost to movement speed with the maximum reaching 50% boost which will spawn at the highest player levels.[/*]
[*]Water Breathing[/*]
[*]Water Walking[/*]
[*]Melee Damage Bonus - New enchantment, adds bonus points to melee weapon damage[/*]
[*]Night Eye[/*]
[*]Ghostveil - New enchantment, based on the rare potion[/*]
[*]Light[/*]
[*]Muffle[/*]
[*]Flame Cloak[/*]
[*]Frost Cloak[/*]
[*]Lightning Cloak[/*]
[*]Voice Cooldown[/*]
[/LIST]
Every new type of circlet has been levelled correctly to maintain balance, so this is not a cheat mod.
The images give you an idea of what you get, they were taken quite randomly and you will find many more.
 
[color=#ee82ee][font=georgia, serif][size=6]Compatibility[/size][/font][/color]
 
This mod doesn\'t mess with the original circlets it just adds lots of new ones, I have edited the levelled lists for circlets [u]ONLY[/u] so other armour and jewelry addition mods won\'t have problem working alongside this.

[color=#ee82ee][font=georgia, serif][size=6]Recommended to use with[/size][/font][/color]
 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7488//?]My Glowing Circlet Gems[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6495//?]Yuril\'s Better Circlets HQ[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5186//?]Shinytickles\'s Hoods and Circlets[/url]
 
[color=#ee82ee][font=georgia, serif][size=6]Installation[/size][/font][/color]
 
Place the esp in the data folder, make sure it\'s checked in the load order.

[color=#ee82ee][font=georgia, serif][size=6]Feedback[/size][/font][/color]
 
Feel free to leave your feedback on the mod page, and I am open to suggestions for improvement.  
I will say though that I don\'t intend to overhaul ALL enchanted gear...not yet at least, but I can whip up a few more enchant types for the circlets or extend the cap or whatever if I find the time.
author: Ironman5000

files.name: Circlet Overhaul V2
files.changelogHtml:
Adds Water Breathing Circlet
Adds Water Walking Circlet
Adds Melee Damage Circlet
Adds Night Eye Circlet

files.name: Circlet Overhaul V3
files.changelogHtml:
Added Ghostveil - set up as a rare item
Added Light - set up as a rare item
Added Muffle - set up as a rare item

files.name: Circlet Overhaul V4
files.changelogHtml:
Added Flame, Frost, and Lightning Cloak Circlets set up as a rare items
Added Voice Cooldown ones - levelled from 5% leading to max of 50% cooldown
